casebody.data:
Edward Roberts, Respondent v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. Decided January 5, 1891. Appeal from judgment entered upon the decision of a judge at special term after trial of the issues. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. A. P. & W. Man, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
